TopicTitle: Suggestion: Show if you can afford something or not directly in the techtree

Articles.Content:
Very basic, I think it'd be nice if the "science-number" would be red or something like this if you don't have science points to get it. I know it's shown if you click on it but it would provide a nicer overview how much you can unlock withotu having to click everything.
